Re/code closes down comments

Re/code closes down comments — For a majority (and when I say “majority,” I’d argue > 90%) of websites out there, internet comments are a stew of vitriolic language and low quality logic. If you really have something to say, 1.) write an email to the author, or 2.) write your own blog post.

Enjoy your day.
